definition: an opening in a garment for the neck of the wearer, kiss, embrace, or fondle with sexual passion
details:
noun
- an opening in a garment for the neck of the wearer
= example: an opening in a garment for the neck of the wearer
= synonyms: neck opening
- a narrow part of an artifact that resembles a neck in position or form
= example: a narrow part of an artifact that resembles a neck in position or form
- the part of an organism, human or animal, that connects the head to the rest of the body
= example: the part of an organism, human or animal, that connects the head to the rest of the body
= synonyms: cervix
- a cut of meat from the neck of an animal
- a narrow elongated projecting strip of land
verb
- kiss, embrace, or fondle with sexual passion
= example: kiss, embrace, or fondle with sexual passion
= synonyms: make out
